ygData.subject: Re: Yonder?
ygData.msgSnippet: damn, i was eager to get that spell too (I even scoped out where it was in the guild... found it in clerics guild).  could you even scribe it? ... From: John
ygData.messageBody:
damn, i was eager to get that spell too (I even scoped out where it was in
the guild... found it in clerics guild). could you even scribe it?

-----Original Message-----
From: John Penman <jpenman@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 2:56 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Yonder?


>From: "John Penman" <jpenman@...>
>
>Ok now Im Pissed. I get to Lvl 29 thinking I can finally cause fear in
>people when I duel them to find out that I cant. Apparently the Yonder
>spell that we are supposed to get at 29 is for Enchanters ONLY. Even
though
>you can buy it in our guild, we can not use it. And the GM I spoke to said
>that it was not meant to be used by Wizards anyway. Time for a new Mass
>Petition.
>
>Shadair J'Axx of "The Chosen Ones"
>Karana
>
>
>
>

>
